title: Squaramide-catalyzed enantioselective Michael addition of nitromethane to 2-enoylazaarenes: synthesis of chiral azaarene-containing γ-nitroketones
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20056-20060
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03826F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hong-Ping Huang, Yu-Hang Xie, Xu-Mei Gan, Xin-Yu Wen, Cui-Xia Wang, Yan-Qiu Deng, Zhen-Wei Zhang
Bifunctional chiral squaramide-catalyzed highly enantioselective Michael addition of nitromethane to diverse 2-enoylazaarenes was successfully performed.
